actions.name: Dictate Text
actions.description: Record an audio and convert it to text.

actions.name: Dictate Command
actions.description: Record an audio and convert it into a text line terminated by the enter key (command).

actions.name: AI Reply Text
actions.description: Record an audio question and provide a text response generated by an AI

actions.name: AI Reply Text For Selection
actions.description: Record an audio question about a selected text and provide a text response generated by an AI

actions.name: AI Reply Text For Copy
actions.description: Record an audio question about a text present in the clipboard (copied text) and provide a text response generated by an AI
